IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: ARTS HUNTSVILLE STIMULATES AND SUPPORTS COMMUNITY CREATIVITY AND ENGAGEMENT BY ADVANCING THE ARTS, ENTERTAINMENT AND CULTURE TO ENRICH QUALITY OF LIFE, EDUCATION AND
IRS990.Desc: PANOPLY OF THE ARTS, CONCERTS IN THE PARK- COMMUNITY WIDE PROMOTION IN ALL AREAS OF THE ARTS THROUGH PERFORMANCES AND EXHIBITIONS OF LOCAL ARTISTS AND GROUPS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: ARTS IN EDUCATION- PROMOTION OF CULTURAL ARTS TO ELEMENTARY AND HIGH SCHOOL STUDENTS THROUGH TEACHER DEVELOPMENT AND PROMOTION AT AREA CLASSES, CAMPS AND HANDS-ON ARTS OPPORTUNITIES.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: ADVOCACY- PROVIDE A LIBRARY OF INFORMATION ABOUT THE ARTS AND SPONSOR SEMINARS AND WORKSHOPS; RENDER ADVICE TO MEMBER ORGANIZATIONS ABOUT PROGRAMMING EVENTS.
